content: ariosa cowl pattern by emmy coplea a simple cowl with a textural broken rib this pattern is written in one size but could be easily adapted for any size desired the rib pattern consists of multiples of two so easily add stitches for a wider cowl materials 2 skeins bulky classic elite ariosa 16 or 24 circular needle us size 10 or size needed to obtain gauge darning needle for weaving in ends gauge 16sts over 4 inches in broken rib cowl size approximately 24 around after blocking 10 long pattern stitch row 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of row row 2 knit cowl co 90 sts join for knitting in the round beginning with row 1 of pattern stitch work in pattern until cowl is approximately 10 ending with row 2 and leaving enough yarn to bind off bind off in pattern on row 1 loosely weave in ends block gently
